bill.title: Medical Marijuana Dispensary; Task Force
bill.description: Requesting The Convening Of A Task Force To Develop Recommendations For The Establishment Of A Regulated Statewide Dispensary System For Medical Marijuana.

history.action: To be offered.
Offered
Referred to HLT/JUD, LMG, referral sheet 24
Re-referred to HLT, JUD, referral sheet 28
Resolution scheduled to be heard by HLT on Friday, 03-21-14 8:30AM in conference room 329.

The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Morikawa, Creagan, Hashem, Kobayashi, Woodson, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Jordan, Oshiro.
Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1323-14) as amended in HD 1, recommending referral to JUD.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on JUD as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Har, Yamane excused (2).
Resolution scheduled to be heard by JUD on Friday, 03-28-14 2:00PM in conference room 325.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org
The committee(s) on JUD recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 04-01-14 at 2:00pm.
Scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 04-01-14 2:00PM in conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Creagan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Nakashima, Tsuji, Wooley, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Har, Belatti, Brower, Ito.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1382-14) as amended in HD 2, recommending adoption.
Adopted as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Fale, Har, Oshiro, Tokioka, Ward voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cachola, Hashem, Wooley excused (3).
Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 420).
Referred to HRE/HTH/CPN, WAM.
The committee(s) on HRE/HTH/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 04-15-14 9:45AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on HRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HRE were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Tokuda.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in HTH were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Baker, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Nishihara.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in CPN were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Taniguchi, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Nishihara, Wakai.
Reported from HRE/HTH/CPN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3463), with recommendation of referral to WAM.
Report adopted, referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 04-17-14 10:55AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, English, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Ruderman, L. Thielen; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 5 Excused: Senator(s) Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, Kouchi, Tokuda, Slom.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3482) with recommendation of adoption, as amended (SD 1).
Report and Resolution Adopted, as amended (SD 1). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 695) in amended form (SD 1).
House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
Adopted as amended in SD 1 with Representative(s) Tokioka voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Har voting no (1) and Representative(s) Evans, Oshiro, Woodson excused (3).
Received notice of Agreement and Adoption in House (Hse. Com. No. 724).
Resolution adopted in final form.
